text: @WhiteHouse AZ man died after he & wife (in their 60's) ingested chloroquine phosphate in an attempt to prevent a COVID-19 infection Pres. Trump touted chloroquine as showing "encouraging & falsely stated that the FDA was working "to be able to make that drug available almost immediately."
